What happens if a federal law violates a state constitution? Dose any one know if there is legal president for this happening?

 Yes there is legal precedent for this happening. Plenty of it. I can't remember the first of these cases (I know my Senior government teacher would kill me for not remembering lol), but I know for absolute sure that federal law trumps state law (constitution or otherwise).
 But why do you ask? I know there must be something you have in mind.
